name: codebender.github.io
body:
### Welcome to my GitHub Page. 

***

Hi, my name is Matthew Bender.  I'm a true Ruby on Rails nerd, I used to be a C# .NET zombie but have since joined and started loving the ruby open source community. More recently I've been working a lot with Rails RESTful APIs and AngularJS front-ends. I enjoy developing with the TDD methodology. As a lead engineer, I am passionate in improving those around me. I attend conferences, go to meet-ups, read blogs, and listen to podcasts, always trying to bring interesting and new ideas to my team. I am now exploring more programming languages for cases when certain technologies can help scale an application. I most interested in Node.js, Elixir, and Go. I have also dabbled in R and started learning the value of data science. 

Open Source R'Angular project, Ruby on Rails + AngularJS:
* [5280Code](https://github.com/codebender/5280code)
  * Integrates with Fitbit API for health data
  * Integrates with Bitstamp and Pusher web sockets for real-time Bitcoin prices

Open Source Ruby on Rails + R Project:
* [Rails Pirate](https://github.com/codebender/rails_pirate)

Open Source R - Kaggle.com Repositories:
* [kaggle-titanic-r](https://github.com/codebender/kaggle-titanic-r)
* [kaggle-digit-recognizer](https://github.com/codebender/kaggle-digit-recognizer)
* [kaggle-bike-sharing](https://github.com/codebender/kaggle-bike-sharing)

Personal Sandbox Websites:
* [5280Code.com](http://5280code.com)
* [BentSolutions.com](http://bentsolutions.com)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
